My journey sits at the intersection of logic and aesthetics. On the technical side, I have honed my skills as a React & Back-End Developer through the intensive Dicoding Academy cohort , where I built robust web applications like 'LearnCheck'. I speak the language of developersâ€”fluent in JavaScript, Node.js, and API integration.

Simultaneously, I thrive in the creative world. As a Creative Team Lead at Atlus Info Indonesia , I manage visual strategies and lead a team to drive over 5,000+ monthly engagements. Whether I am debugging code or crafting high-fidelity designs in Figma, my goal remains the same: to create seamless, user-centric experiences.

uiProjects.title: UI/UX Projects
uiProjects.description: I designed StuPlan!, an Android-based application focused on simplicity and productivity. Key design decisions included
uiProjects.feature1: Intuitive Dashboard: A clean summary of daily schedules and upcoming deadlines to reduce cognitive load
uiProjects.feature2: Smart Reminders: Custom notification system for tasks and exams to ensure students never miss a due date.
uiProjects.feature3: Progress Visualization: A dedicated Statistics Page using charts to track study time and task completion, motivating users to stay consistent.
